[{"category":["CDs & Vinyl","Latin Music","Latin Pop"],"description":["Formed within the rich underground electronic scene that's become Bogota, Colombia, Bomba Estereo fuses Colombian folkloric rhythms like cumbria, bullerengue, and champeta with electronica, dub, and hip-hop. The group is known for their explosive dance sound, and they converted unsuspecting SXSW 2009 crowds into instant fans."],"title":"Blow Up","brand":"Bomba Estreo","rank":"124,334 in CDs & Vinyl (","asin":"B002AJQ7G0","imageURLHighRes":["https:\/\/images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com\/images\/I\/61r6wKaUUQL.jpg"],"details":{"Audio CD":"(January 25, 2011)","Original Release Date:":"January 25, 2011","Number of Discs:":"1","Label:":"Nacional Records","Run Time:":"45 minutes","ASIN:":"B002AJQ7G0"}}]

[{"category":["CDs & Vinyl","World Music","Far East & Asia","Korea"],"description":["KOREAN VERSION. 2013 holiday release from the South Korean-Chinese boy band. MIRACLES IN DECEMBER is a follow-up to the group's first studio album XOXO, which was released in June 2013. Released in two separate languages, Exo-K recorded the EP's tracks in Korean while Exo-M performed the same songs in Mandarin. Features six tracks."],"title":"Miracles in December: Korean Version","brand":"EXO","rank":"50,314 in CDs & Vinyl (","asin":"B00H1NK5YK","imageURLHighRes":["https:\/\/images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com\/images\/I\/314RIoa-MtL.jpg"],"details":{"Audio CD":"(December 17, 2013)","Number of Discs:":"1","Label:":"Sm Entertainment Kr","ASIN:":"B00H1NK5YK"}}]

[{"category":["CDs & Vinyl","Metal"],"description":["In May 2012 Anathema released WEATHER SYSTEMS, the most acclaimed and successful album of a career that has spanned over two decades. The album scored high in numerous critics end of year polls around the world and cemented their reputation as one of the most exciting and progressive bands around. Following the release of the album, the band embarked on a lengthy world tour. The European leg of the tour opened with a triumphant one-off show at the ancient Roman theatre of Philippopolis with the Plovdiv Philharmonic Orchestra in September 2012. Directed by celebrated filmmaker Lasse Hoile (Steven Wilson, Porcupine Tree, Opeth, Dream Theater), UNIVERSAL captures the magic of the event on a 2 Disc (CD + DVD) set."],"title":"Universal","brand":"Anathema","rank":"264,709 in CDs & Vinyl (","asin":"B00DG86AKM","imageURLHighRes":["https:\/\/images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com\/images\/I\/51ZPWXcRk2L.jpg"],"details":{"Audio CD":"(September 17, 2013)","Number of Discs:":"1","Label:":"KSCOPE","ASIN:":"B00DG86AKM"}}]
